attributes.action: Allow the British public to have a public holiday for the Euros final on monday.
attributes.additional_details: Its the first time since ‘96 since England has made it to a sporting final.
attributes.background: Create a public holiday for Monday 12th of July 2021

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
